title: Home
welcomeText:
# Drop your lens footprint, increase your limpid.

Bio-based lenses are better, clearer, less waste and provide the ultimate clarity. With our Biolen-UV range, high ABBE, high Light Transmission, clear optical clarity, low birefringence & other common high quality customer wants are now not limited to fossil fuel related lenses. Biolen-UV is a direct replacement for CR39 & Nylon lenses, using up to 60% renewable materials within the lens material, translates to up to 50% reduction in carbon footprint. Biolen also recycles the material waste and provides this recycled material to manufacture of other products, such as glasses frames.
seoDescription: A quickstart for Nuxt & Netlify CMS
